text: CIXN-FM is a Canadian radio station in Fredericton, New Brunswick. It broadcasts Christian contemporary music and other religious shows, and is found at 96.5 MHz. The station has been broadcasting since April 8, 2001.Decision CRTC 2000-379 ==References== ==External links== *Joy FM 96.5 * * Ixn Ixn Category:Radio stations established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in New Brunswick
title: CIXN-FM
